text: Mel Martinez (born October 23, 1946) is an American politician. He represented Florida in the United States Senate from 2005 until 2009. He was the 12th United States Secretary of Housing and Urban Development. He is a Republican. Martinez was born on October 23, 1946 in Sagua La Grande, Cuba. He graduated from Florida State University. He is married to Kitty Martínez. They have three children. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Secretaries of Housing and Urban Development Category:Florida State University alumni
title: Mel Martínez
